00001 using System;
00002 using System.Security.Cryptography;
00003 using System.Text;
00004 
00005 namespace PMTComponents
00006 {
00007     public class Encryption
00008     {
00014         public static string encrypt(string toEncrypt)
00015         {
00016             MD5 md5 = MD5.Create();
00017             string encrypted = BitConverter.ToString(md5.ComputeHash(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(toEncrypt))).Replace("-", String.Empty).ToLower();
00018             return encrypted;
00019         }
00020     }
00021 }
